content: Create your 'celebrity pool': add characters (real or fictional).
You will describe and guess these characters in 3 different rounds.
The team who guesses more characters wins.
Use only WORDS to describe the character.
Use as many words as you want until your team guesses (or the time ends ⏰).
Try to remember all characters because the 'celebrity pool' stays the same for the entire game.
Use only ONE WORD to describe the character.
The team has only ONE guess. Click 👍 if they guess, 👎 if they don't.
Use only GESTURES to describe the character. AKA charades time!
The team has only ONE GUESS. Click 👍 if they guess, 👎 if they don't.
